VEvil.​Core.​Editor.​Properties.​SceneReferencePropertyDrawer
PropertyDrawer
[CustomPropertyDrawer(typeof(SceneReference))]
public
VEvil.​Core.​Editor.​Properties.​SceneReferencePropertyDrawer

Display a SceneReference object inside the Editor.  If the SceneAsset given is valid, provide basic buttons to interact with the Scene's role in the Build settings.

Constants
SCENE_ASSET_PROPERTY_STRING
private const string SCENE_ASSET_PROPERTY_STRING

The exact name of the asset's Object attribute in the SceneReference's object.

SCENE_PATH_PROPERTY_STRING
private const string SCENE_PATH_PROPERTY_STRING

The exact name of the scene's path attribute in the SceneReference's object.

Variables
boxPadding
private static readonly RectOffset boxPadding

The padding of the Box.

Constants
PADDING_SIZE
private const float PADDING_SIZE

The size of the Box padding.

FOOTER_HEIGHT
private const float FOOTER_HEIGHT

The height of the box's footer.

Variables
LINE_HEIGHT
private static readonly float LINE_HEIGHT

The height of the lines.

PADDED_LINE
private static readonly float PADDED_LINE

The line with the padding.

VEvil.​Core.​Editor.​Properties.​SceneReferencePropertyDrawer.​BuildUtils
private static
VEvil.​Core.​Editor.​Properties.​SceneReferencePropertyDrawer.​BuildUtils

Various BuildSettings interactions.

Variables
minCheckWait
private static readonly float minCheckWait

Time in seconds that we have to wait before we query again when IsReadOnly is called.

lastTimeChecked
private static float lastTimeChecked
cachedReadonlyVal
private static bool cachedReadonlyVal
VEvil.​Core.​Editor.​Properties.​SceneReferencePropertyDrawer.​BuildUtils.​BuildScene
public struct
VEvil.​Core.​Editor.​Properties.​SceneReferencePropertyDrawer.​BuildUtils.​BuildScene

A small container for tracking scene data BuildSettings.

Variables
buildIndex
public int buildIndex
assetGUID
public GUID assetGUID
assetPath
public string assetPath
scene
public EditorBuildSettingsScene scene
Functions
IsReadOnly
public static bool IsReadOnly()

Check if the build settings asset is readonly.  Caches value and only queries state a max of every minCheckWait seconds.

QueryBuildSettingsStatus
private static bool QueryBuildSettingsStatus()

A blocking call to the Version Control system to see if the build settings asset is readonly.  Use BuildSettingsIsReadOnly for version that caches the value for better responsiveness.

GetBuildScene
public static BuildScene GetBuildScene(
Object 
_sceneObject
)

For a given SceneAsset object reference, extract its build settings data, including buildIndex.

_buildScene,

_enabled
)

Enable/Disable a given scene in the buildSettings.
